title: How to improve the quant section as I am scoring very low and not able to attempt many questions during mock papers - Quora

response.answer_text: Learn the formulas and tricks to solve questions faster. Memorise squares, cubes and all. Then practice as much questions as you can. Set yourself time limit while solving questions. Practice practice and practice. That is the only way to gain speed. Practice improves speed and accuracy and confidence. Its not that tough. Definitely you can do.
